title: Context-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Project

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of College-Level Foundational Mathematics (Calculus, Linear Algebra)
context.additional_context: Practical project-based course for job seekers, emphasizing smartphone-based learning activities

learning_goals: Learners can redefine and propose solutions for mathematical problems arising in real-world vocational contexts across at least three scenarios.
Learners can reflect on problem-solving processes through peer and self-evaluation and submit at least two improvement plans.
Learners can connect mathematical concepts to at least five real-life cases by applying situated learning theory.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
